name: Download charts image as png in angular
tagline: Download charts image as png in angular
body:
### About Project.
This project aims at adding the feature of downloading chart images in png or jpeg format in  current angular charts.Further, will add the feature of downloading pdf file containing images of charts.

### Check demo at
Example for Line charts
http://readinspeed.com/trial/chart/downloadcharts/downloadcharts/LineChart.html
Example for Cumulative Line Chart
http://readinspeed.com/trial/chart/downloadcharts/downloadcharts/CumalitiveLIneChart.html

### How to use it?
Initially download 

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
